pools: Array of any of these pools: 'acUSD-USDC', 'afUSDC-USDC', 'stSOL-2Pool', 'aUSDC-4Pool', 'abBUSD-4Pool', 'aaUSDT-4Pool'
User should have a position opened in defined pools
walletPrivateKey: Private key of a wallet that has farming positions opened on meteora.ag
compoundingTimeout: Hours to wait between every compounding cycle
